comments: Dr. Perry is a great man...very helpful if you talk to him. The class wasn\'t easy, but I learned a ton. I recommend him.

The class is fine, you do not need to to go to class or buy the packet. Most of the readings you can find online. Quizes are fairly easy, pretty easy class as long as you do well in the simulation project. It is a group simulation with an individual final simulation, not bad at all!
